page.title: 07Blithfield W I
page.content: Blighfield Womenn's Institute meets once a month on a Monday evenig at Newton village Hall. There are only eighteen members, at the moment, because they do not cover a very populated area. They have a speaker every month and cover a wide range of topics from embroidery to microwave cookery. They celebrate christmas with a party at Amaston Village Hall and an annual lunch is held in a membrs home, which is the only fund raising event as unlike most WIs they cannot otain money through usual ways with jumble sales and coffee mornings owing to the lack of people in the area. They celebrated their daimond Jubilee in 1985 with a dinner. Blithfield WI is linked with Abots Bromley WI for the RM held in London and belongs to the parkside group and to the Staffordshire federation.
